preconditions.precondition: Manager has access to the inventory management system

mainSequence.step: Manager accesses the inventory management system
UI requests the current inventory list
Backend queries inventory items from the database
Database returns inventory items to Backend
Backend displays inventory items to UI
Manager selects an item to update
UI sends update inventory request with details to Backend
Backend updates the item in the database
Database confirms the update to Backend
Backend confirms the success to Manager
UI displays the update confirmation to Manager
